### [Fix PDF Splitter](https://replit.com/bounties/@cmcox/fix-pdf-splitter)

Our Replit PDF Splitter app is used for splitting a digest of signed PODs (Proof of Deliveries from a courier). It works great with documents with selectable text, but we'd like to:
(1) improve robustness for non-selectable text (I think I've done this actually using the AI agent - but the selection boundaries are wrong)
(2) check each signature with AI and validate that it is a valid signature (again I have implemented this feature and it's working mostly correctly but not populating some of the fields on the emails that need to go out)

Acceptance Criteria
1--> PDFs split correctly (i.e. each PDF in its own file, named for the numeric portion after the "Number: " field in the box)
2--> Emails populate with the Delivered At: and Receiver: fields properly populated
3--> Signature validation performs correctly as expected (i.e. blank signature boxes and single line signatures fail, others pass)

Technical Details
Written in python, with help from AI (um, mostly by AI...

### [Help With Deploying Flask WebApp Game](https://replit.com/bounties/@leocheeseburger/help-with-deploying)

I have created a game based on a board game called "Sounds Fishy". It is mostly written, with a few problems with it that need to be fixed, including the ability to deploy it. It's mostly vibe coded, so I guess you need to figure that out as well. It works similar to Jackbox games if that makes sense, but there are two or three issues that I would like fixed if possible in any manner possible. I don't mind you using any tools at all as long as the problems are fixed. I don't care about runtime or anything right now, this is just going to be used on a very small scale.

The game should be deployable on a server, with the problems below solved, and I might need a little bit of help connecting it to the domain that I have bought for it. I would also like the ability to update text files etc.

Technical Details
The project currently works when locally hosted but doesn't start up when deployed on a server like heroku. It isn't a true frontend/backend, which I think might be a problem withi...

### [WebGL Developer Needed for Scroll-Based 3D Web Experience (Prototype Build)](https://replit.com/bounties/@chillzone123/webgl-developer-need)

WebGL Developer Needed for Scroll-Based 3D Web Experience (Prototype Build)

We‚Äôre looking for a talented WebGL developer to build a creative, scroll-driven 3D interactive prototype. The experience should blend stylized visuals, immersive transitions, and light interactivity - all accessible in a modern web browser.

The concept is designed to be playful and engaging, not hyper-realistic. Think simple camera transitions, terrain reveal moments, and interactive objects or scenes. You‚Äôll have freedom in choosing the tech stack (Three.js, React Three Fiber, Unity WebGL, Spline, etc.) as long as performance and user experience are clean.

Project Scope:

A scroll or simple-input-based flight or movement experience

A transition or trigger event that reveals a hidden area or scene

A final space or environment with 1‚Äì3 interactive elements (click to reveal, hover effects, toggle content)

Performance-optimized for smooth browser access (desktop preferred)

Deployment on Vercel or Netlify

### [Build a Universal Web3 App on ZetaChain](https://replit.com/bounties/@jonathan640/build-a-universal-we)

üß† Problem Description

ZetaChain is the only blockchain that supports universal apps ‚Äî dApps that can interact with any chain (including native Bitcoin) from a single contract.

We're looking for a working demo of a Universal App that highlights this cross-chain functionality. It should be built using the ZetaChain UniversalKit and deployed to ZetaChain Testnet.

Some sample use cases:
A BTC-to-DeFi bridge (send native BTC, trigger USDC swap on Polygon)
A universal stablecoin payment app (send from any chain to fulfill a payment)
A cross-chain NFT minter (mint on ZetaChain, settle with ETH/BTC/BNB/etc.)
An AI agent that executes real chain-to-chain actions via ZetaChain

‚úÖ Acceptance Criteria

A Replit project with working frontend + backend code
Demonstrates a core ZetaChain capability (e.g. native BTC, omnichain asset use, one-click UX across chains)
Live testnet deployment with link
Instructions on how to test/interact
Uses UniversalKit SDK
Create a short demo video

Bonus: Post yo...

### [Fix coding issues on website](https://replit.com/bounties/@carolraheempwc/fix-coding-issues-on)

Project Overview: ODURE AI ‚Äì AI-Powered Fashion Intelligence Assistant
ODURE AI is designed to be a globally competitive, AI-powered fashion assistant that enables users to upload outfit images and receive exact or visually matched fashion item combinations pulled from a live, constantly updated database of over 1 million online fashion retailers.

Key Functionality Goals:
Image Analysis Engine:
Parses uploaded images to identify garments (type, color, style) using AI vision models.
Output is converted into structured data to support dynamic outfit recommendation.

Product Sourcing Engine:
Crawls + indexes fashion products across fast fashion, midrange, luxury, indie, sustainable, and thrifted/vintage retailers globally.
Provides real-time product data (image, price, brand, link, availability) for exact or similar item matching.

Outfit Recommendation System:
For each upload, generates a set of outfit combinations from the product database based on user tier:

### [üí° Build AI-Powered ‚ÄúAd Copy & Content Idea Tool‚Äù Tool in Replit (with GPT API)](https://replit.com/bounties/@emily252/build-ai-powered-ad)

I‚Äôm launching a series of AI tools to help business owners and course creators create marketing assets using GPT + custom logic.

Your task is to build a working prototype of a "Content & Ad Copy Generator" in Replit, powered by the OpenAI API.

üõ† Here‚Äôs what I need:

A simple web interface where users fill in prompts like:

What's your ideal customers biggest frustration?
What's your ideal customers biggest dreams? Be Specific.

Then take that and come up with specific content ideas so the user can go record a video and from there generate simple ad copy for the content.

The app passes this info to GPT (via API or pre-structured prompt, I have been told building a custom GPT in the background of Replit might work better)

The tool generates compelling content ideas and simple ad copy.

Display output in a clean, formatted way

Include option to export/download the result

I'm not sure if this is possible but i would like to limit the amount somebody can submit requests as well.

üí° ...

### [Data Integration Bounty: Store Management System](https://replit.com/bounties/@antoinecameron/data-integration-bou)


Project Overview
Complete data integration for a React/Express.js store management application with PostgreSQL database containing 683+ franchise and corporate store records.

Current State
Working application with basic CRUD operations
PostgreSQL database with stores table structure in place
Partial data corruption issues with incorrect address mapping
Two authoritative CSV data sources available
Required Tasks
Data Cleanup & Integration
Primary Objective: Completely map all 683 stores using authentic CSV data sources

Data Sources:

Uberall-full-list-7-7-2025\_1751925388545.csv - Contact information (addresses, phone numbers, store URLs)
Store-info-store-info-final\_1751925388546.csv - Business details (owner names, social media links, consultants)
Critical Requirements:

Map by Store Number (primary key)
Eliminate ALL instances of "18 Danada Square West, Wheaton, IL" corruption
Ensure 100% data accuracy from source files
Maintain referential integrity
Database Schema Verification

Deliverables:

Integration of 3 modes per channel (Email, LinkedIn, WhatsApp):
Each channel (Email, LinkedIn, WhatsApp) must support the following modes:

Manual: the user writes and schedules each step manually
Semi-automatic: the AI suggests a message that the user can edit (learning mode)
Autonomous: the AI handles everything (messaging, sending, timing, and adaptation)

Profile visit
Connection request

InMail

Securely retrieve the li\_at cookie (LinkedIn session ID)
Synchronize with the AI agent
Store the session securely with encryption and safe usage

Automated sending of personalized messages
Consent management
